title: The Necromancer
text: A cloaked figure hangs above the ground, limp and lifeless, but the power exuding from it tells you that it is not all that it seems.
blocka: Attach to Undari's Tomb.
blockb: xxCIRCLE Characters entering this space must stop movement.
blockc: xxCIRCLE When the Necromancer is burned, give a character on this mission the tag Deathtouched.
blockd: xxACTIVATE One character at a North Oaks location is Exhausted.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.
blocka: Attach to Undari's Tomb.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.
blocka: Attach to Mirror Woods.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
text: Dead, grey eyes stare back at you, liveliness long gone and replaced with a blank stare.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
text: The soulless husk limping towards you reeks of rotting flesh.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature's face is sagging to one side, like wax placed in a flame, their features beyond recognition. The very image of them sends shivers down your spine.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature groans, the sound of bare bone scraping painfully against the earth echoing in your ears.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Restless Dead
text: Clearly victims of a terrible pox, come back to share their misery.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Grueling Wilds
text: The weather in North Oaks is wild and unpredictable.
blocka: Effect: Subtract 1 from all tests at this location.

title: Grueling Wilds
text: The weather in North Oaks is wild and unpredictable.
blocka: Effect: Subtract 1 from all tests at this location.

title: The Standing Stone
blocka: Scribbled on a stone are what appear to be coded Imperial messages. Who from Red Bank is sending these messages? Take 1 Discord.

title: The Last Necromancer
blocka: There are signs that the Necromancer of North Oaks was not alone. But was he master... or servant? One character at this location is Frustrated.

title: Wandering Sprite
blocka: Out of the mists, a shimmering figure appears, no bigger than a toad. Gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location.

title: Rocky Terrain
blocka: 'I know! But your footing doesn't look so good (xxSURVIVAL)!' If failed, one character making this test is Weary.

title: Dense Forest
blocka: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber. Gain 1 Timber die.

title: Dense Forest
blocka: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber. Gain 1 Timber die.

title: Dense Forest
blocka: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber. Gain 1 Timber die.

title: Forest Boar
blocka: 'Hey Keel, could you peek your head in there and see if it's empty (xxCOMBAT)?' If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character taking the test is Weary.

title: Abandoned Mine
blocka: Scattered mines from old Amber Hand outposts can still be found in the forest. Gain 1 Ore die.

title: Sudden Storm
blocka: 'Stop whining and keep moving! You want to freeze to death?' Take 2 Discord.

title: Radiant Fernbrake
blocka: The pale red plant has a vast number of uses. However, it is very difficult to harvest correctly (xxLORE). If passed, gain 1 Luxury die.

title: Eldritch Energy
blocka: Ripples of magic ebb out from some chaotic source deeper within the forest (xxLORE). If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: A Failed Defense
blocka: The casualties of a long forgotten war echo their pain and anger into the forest. One character at this location is Exhausted.

title: Ile
text: Ile is best equipped to see through the veil of sorcery. She harbors anger from being separated from her people, the Moonriders.
blocka: Attach to Horsethief Meadows.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord and gain 1 xxMANA die.

title: Past Deals
text: Ask yourself, aren't you also responsible for how bad things have become?
blocka: Attach to Hogel Manor.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Remove 1 Mission Progress die at this location.

title: Family Honor
text: What is your great society if it doesn't value families?
blocka: Attach to Song Bluff.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Reroll all the Mission Progress dice at this location.

title: Dashen
text: The young swordsman displays his worth to Arban by testing what the diplomats from Red Bank know of horse lore.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: Hogel
text: Hah! You think Arban rules the Sunriders? But who has the will of the people?
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 2 Mission Progress at this location.

title: Border Raids
text: The Moonriders continue to attack us from the east.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 1 Mission Progress at this location and take 1 Discord.

title: Depleted Mana
text: The lake has been too hungry to think about much else.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Lose 1 xxMANA die from Spirit Lake.

title: Pelekhar's Shadow
text: The dragon is a constant source of worry.
blocka: xxACTIVATE One character at a mission location is Exhausted.

title: Rumors of Smoke
blocka: It is madness to beseech the wyrm Pelakhar for aid. Take 1 Discord.

title: Sunrider Aid
blocka: The Sunriders favor bold action. May reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location.

title: Life on the Steppes
blocka: There is grain as far as the eye can see. Gain 1 Food die.

title: Ile's Campaign
blocka: Why put off the inevitable? You may spend resources to remove one stack of threat cards.

title: Arban's Decree
blocka: The leader of the Sunriders doesn't often listen to the suggestions of others. Take 1 Discord.

title: Battle Plans
blocka: The Sunriders keep one eye on the horizon. You may discard one Security threat card.

title: Dragon Shrine
blocka: The influence of the great wyrm is everywhere. You may take 1 Discord to gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location.

title: Shame To Anger
blocka: 'Why can't you just trust my judgement?' If there is a Frustrated character at this location, they become Angry.

title: Looking West
blocka: At the far edge of the plains the Empire lies in wait (xxTACTICS). If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making this test becomes Angry.

title: Favors Returned
blocka: You may spend 1 Mana to gain 2 Food dice.

title: Arban's Sunset Ride
blocka: 'Keep up! Keep up (xxCOMMAND)!' If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making this test becomes Weary.

title: Taichu's Test
blocka: Taichu, the greatest of the Sunrider's military commanders, is the key to Arban's support (xxCOMMAND). If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Rousing Speech
blocka: 'Let us not lose sight of the will of the Empire! They seek to divide us (xxRAPPORT)!' If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Moonrider Envoy
blocka: Take 2 Discord if Ile is in play.

title: Horse Games
blocka: 'Well... here goes nothing... (xxCOMBAT)'. If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making this test becomes Exhausted.

title: Graycloak
text: Wait? Who did you say you were here to see?
blocka: Attach to Map Hall. Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Did you hear that?
blocka: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I just don't like the way you look.
blocka: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Well, they provide three square meals.
blocka: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Cool sword, right?
blocka: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location then move left.

title: Graycloak
text: One more for the road. And then one more after that.
blocka: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location then move left.

title: Graycloak
text: I'm just here for the rest and relaxation.
blocka: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord if any characters are at this location then move left.

title: Graycloak Captain
text: I've stabbed people for far less. That's the reason I took this job. That and they threatened to kill my family.
blockc: Characters must stop moving when entering this location.
blockd: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord if any characters are at this location then remove 1 Mission Progress die.

title: A Cold Place
blocka: The streets of Eastkeep are punishing, but secrets are there for the taking - if you're willing to pay the price. You may make a character at this location weary to add three xxPROGRESS. Then burn card.

title: The Thea Dossier
blocka: You have discovered meticulous notes detailing a campaign to discredit and destroy everything Thea loves.
blocke: Make Thea angry and burn this card.

title: The Resistance
blocka: There are whispers and rumors of discontent throughout the Empire. Fear keeps the populace from action, but perhaps there are allies to be gained?

title: First Contact
blocka: xxRAPPORT If you pass, gain 1 xxFORTUNE. If you fail, one character taking the test is frustrated.

title: Establishing Safehouses
blocka: xxDISGUISE If you pass, gaine 1 xxFORTUNE. If you fail, one character taking the test is weary.

title: Compromised Position
blocka: (xxTACTICS). If you pass, gain 1 xxFORTUNE. If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Spies
blocka: (xxDISGUISE). If you pass, gain 1 xxFORTUNE. If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Trapped Safe
blocka: (xxTHIEVERY). If you pass, gain 1 xxFORTUNE. If you fail, one character taking test is frustrated.

title: Risky Gambit
blocka: Optional (xxTHIEVERY). If you pass, gain two xxFORTUNE. If you fail, gain three xxDISCORD.

title: Costume Ball
blocka: Optional (xxDISGUISE). If you pass, gain four progress. If you fail, gain three xxDISCORD.

title: Hidden Passage
blocka: Optional (xxTHIEVERY). If you pass, gain two xxLUXURY dice. If you fail, gain three xxDISCORD.

title: Safehouse
blocka: A chance to rest and regroup. Remove 1 Discord.

title: Intercepted Plans
blocka: The Guild of Secrets has grown complacent and overconfident. Getting information is easier than expected. Discard one Espionage threat card.

title: Paranoid Mob
blocka: Placement: Lush Fields
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat 1). If passed, discard and take 2 Discord.

title: Paranoid Mob
blocka: Placement: Salmon Run
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat 1). If passed, discard and take 2 Discord.

title: Formless Spawn
blocka: Placement: The Weird Rock
blockb: xxACTION Test (Lore 3). If you pass, discard Formless Spawn and all Dark Thoughts obstacles in play.

title: Obstacle: Foe
text: 2 xxPROGRESS / xxBODY
blocka: xxACTION Test (Combat 1). If you pass, discard and take 2 Discord.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Foe
text: 2 xxPROGRESS / xxBODY
blocka: xxACTION Test (Combat 1). If you pass, discard and take 2 Discord.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Foe
text: 2 xxPROGRESS / xxBODY
blocka: xxACTION Test (Combat 1). If you pass, discard and take 2 Discord.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Sorcery
text: 3 Discord / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.
blockb: xxQUICK One character at Sightrock location loses turn.

title: Obstacle: Sorcery
text: 3 Discord / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.
blockb: xxAIR One character at Sightrock location becomes angry.

title: Obstacle: Sorcery
text: 3 Discord / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.
blockb: xxAIR One character at Sightrock location becomes angry.

title: Obstacle: Sorcery
text: 3 Discord / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 2). If you pass, discard.
blockb: xxAIR One character at Sightrock location becomes angry.

title: Event
tags: The worm rests his head each night on mana untold. Retrieving it may have catastrophic results for Red Bank.

title: Event
tags: In shadow of Sightrock are carved messages in a forgotten language, foretelling dark days ahead.
rsummary: If you choose to decipher the symbols, one character in Sightrock is shaken and gain one secret.

title: Event
rsummary: Gain a number of xxMANA dice equal to Sorcery.

title: Event
rsummary: Optional: Test (Lore 2). Success: +2 xxFORTUNE dice. Failure: +3 xxDISCORD.

title: Entrenched Ideology
blocka: Placement: Green Haven
blockb: xxACTION (Test Command 2) If you pass, discard.

title: Isolationism
blocka: Placement: Spinner Lakes
blockb: xxACTION (Test Lore 2) If you pass, discard.

title: Sdila
blocka: Placement: First Haven
blockb: xxACTION (Test Rapport 2). If you pass, discard. If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.
blockc: xxAIR Gain one xxDISCORD for each issue obstacle in play.

title: Obstacle: Diplomat
text: 3 xxPROGRESS / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Combat 2) If you pass, discard.
blockb: xxAIR One character at this location is frustrated.

title: Obstacle: Diplomat
text: 2 xxPROGRESS / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Thievery 2) If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Diplomat
text: 1 xxPROGRESS / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Tactics 2) If you pass, discard. If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.

title: Obstacle: Issue
text: 3 xxPROGRESS / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Survival 1) If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Issue
text: 3 xxPROGRESS / xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 2) If you pass, discard.

title: Event
tags: Radia is the sage and oracle of Gravewood. She whispers in your ear about Red Bank's dark past, and a growing danger in your midst.
rsummary: Optionally, you may gain three xxSECRETS and one character at a Gravewood mission locaion is shattered.

title: Attachment
tags: A black obsidian key, shimmering with highlights of brass, capable of opening almost any lock.
rsummary: Play on a character at a Gravewood location.

title: Event
tags: What kind of dung brain doesn't know what snow cat tracks look like? How is it possible that you have survived this long, bereft of both wits and beauty?
rsummary: If Samo is in play, Test (Command 2). If you fail, all characters making the test are angry.

title: Event
tags: They have been caught this time, but what does this presage for the future?

title: Event
tags: The gods made the island invisible to shield Yari's people from the Sunriders. But the Yarifolk became vain - and stayed too long - and the gods turned Yari into The Weaver, guarding his spider silk of invisibility amongst the undead.

title: Event
tags: The springs are lush with life, and all is well in the world. Time for rest.

title: Event
tags: I'm not sure if your fighting spirit is up to the task? Sad, really.
rsummary: Test (Command 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Event
tags: The leader of First Haven kept an unrelenting pace through the traces of snow and mud, in singular pursuit of his quarry. While the hunt continued, so did the judgement.
rsummary: Test (Survival 1). If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.

title: Event
rsummary: Test (Disguise 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Event
rsummary: Test (Command 2). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Event
rsummary: Test (Lore 1). If you fail, one character making the test is angry.

title: Event
rsummary: Test (Thievery 1). If you fail, one character making the test is weary

title: Event
rsummary: Test (Rapport 2). If you fail, one character making the test is frustrated

title: Event
rsummary: Test (Rapport 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

ctriggers: A Summit of the Five Havens
title: Event
rsummary: Test (Command 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Unalive and Alone
text: I never asked for this existance. And I intend to find out why I came back.
blocka: Attach to Blue Rock.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Add 2 Mission Progress and give Oniri a Condition.

title: Captured Ally
text: Freeing the young Ivian from capture would greatly aid Resistance morale.
blocka: Placement: Whitehold
blockb: xxACTION (Test Thievery 3). If you pass, gain one xxSECRETS and discard obstacle.
blockc: xxAIR One character at this location is exhausted.

title: Graycloak Captain
blocka: Placement: The Salty Freetrader
blockb: xxACTION (Test Disguise 2). Discard guard captain and all other guards at this location.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 2). Discard guard captain and all other guards at this location.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 1). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 1). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 1). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 1). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 1). If you pass, discard.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 2). Discard guard captain and all other guards at this location.

title: Event
rsummary: You may spend 6 xxFOOD to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Attachment
blocka: xxACTION Gain two xxDISCORD and gain one xxSECRETS.
blockb: xxEARTH If there is a guard at this location, any characters also at this location are wounded.

title: Obstacle: Guard
text: xxDEFENSE / 1 xxPSYCHE
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise 1). If you pass, discard.

title: Event
rsummary: (Test Thievery 1) If you pass, gain one xxLUXURY. If you fail, one character making the test is weary.

title: Event
rsummary: (Test Thievery 2) If you pass, gain two xxFORTUNE. If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Event
rsummary: (Test Disguise 1) If you pass, gain one xxMANA. If you fail, one character making the test is angry.

title: Event
rsummary: (Test Disguise 2) If you pass, gain two xxFORTUNE. If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.

title: Event
rsummary: Optional (Test Thievery 2). If you pass, gain two xxSECRETS. If you fail, one character making the test is shattered.

title: Event
rsummary: (Test Tactics 1). If you pass, you may discard any one threat in play. If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.

title: Event
rsummary: (Test Rapport 1). If you pass, gain 1 xxFORTUNE. If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.

title: Weaver of Secrets
text: One suitably motivated can cause limitless destruction.
blocka: Attach to Outer Fernbrake.
blockb: xxACTION Breaking the Veil. Move any amount of Progress from the Veil Ward threat to this card.
blockc: xxACTIVATE Move to the mission location with the most Mission Progress on it. Then remove the highest value Mission Progress die there.

title: The Embattled Leader
blocka: Attach to Outer Fernbrake.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Burn one Conspiracy Spreads obstacle and make Thea Weary.

title: Violent Locals
text: The boy's death must be avenged!
blocka: Attach to House of Lavender.
blockb: xxACTIVATE If at Outer Fernbrake, take 2 Discord. Otherwise, move one location left.

title: Conspiracy Spreads
text: I heard that Thea's deathless puppet killed the child.
blocka: Attach to Outer Fernbrake.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: Autarch Spy
text: Thea no longer represents our true interests! Glory to the real Red Bank!
blocka: Attach to Graywash Spring.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Move one location right and subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Conspiracy Spreads
text: Nepotian saw Oniri fell that poor boy low. Why isn't anyone allowed to talk about it?
blocka: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: Conspiracy Spreads
text: Was it under Thea's orders to make us hate the Empire more?
blocka: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: Imperial Scouts
text: They're still out there!
blocka: xxACTIVATE Make one character at a mission location Weary.

title: Autarch Spy
text: Thea no longer represents our true interests! Glory to the real Red Bank!
blocka: xxACTIVATE Move one location right and subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Autarch Spy
text: Thea no longer represents our true interests! Glory to the real Red Bank!
blocka: xxACTIVATE Move one location right and subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Autarch Spy
text: Thea no longer represents our true interests! Glory to the real Red Bank!
blocka: xxACTIVATE Move one location right and subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Violent Locals
text: The boy's death must be avenged!
blocka: xxACTIVATE If at Outer Fernbrake, take 2 Discord. Otherwise, move one location left.

title: Violent Locals
text: The boy's death must be avenged!
blocka: xxACTIVATE If at Outer Fernbrake, take 2 Discord. Otherwise, move one location left.

title: Thea's Wisdom
blocka: If Thea is at a Red Bank location, may add a Mission Progress die there.

title: Funeral Dirge
blocka: Despair is thick in the air. Take 2 Discord.

title: A Father's Vengeance
blocka: 'Justice for Castor! Justice for Castor!' Take 1 Discord for each Violent Locals obstacle in play.

title: Aid from Burgan Vale
blocka: The Order of the Eye is mysterious, but occasionally helpful. Add a Mana die to the pool.

title: Word from Afar
blocka: 'Sorry to interrupt you, but I've received an urgent notice from Lily Manor (xxCOMMAND).' If passed, may move one character from this location to any Faction location.

title: Keeping Cool
blocka: 'Yes. Yes! Yes, I hear you. You understand I am on your side here? (xxCOMMAND).' If failed, one character making this test is Frustrated.

title: Make an Exception
blocka: 'Castor's cousin was behind this. What should we do with him (xxCOMMAND)?' If passed, may pull a Mission Progress die to the current location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Community Building
blocka: There is no reasoning with people who are angry and afraid (xxCOMMAND). If passed, may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location. Otherwise, subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Searching for Clues
blocka: There are numerous signs of Imperial activity, but nothing substantial yet (xxSURVIVAL). If passed, may exchange a Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making test is Exhausted.

title: Oniri's Aid
blocka: 'Keep. Up (xxSURVIVAL)'. If passed, may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Traces of Power
blocka: The source of the magic has been found, but can it be weakened (xxLORE)? If passed, add 2 Progress to Veil Ward threat.

title: Sorcerous Drain
blocka: Conserving magical energy is not easy (xxLORE). If failed, remove one Mana die at the House of Lavender.

title: Raid Under Sparrow Keep
blocka: Aided by a team of guards, raids are conducted against Sparrow Keep (xxCOMBAT). If passed, add an Ore die to Sparrow Keep. Otherwise, one character making this test is Wounded.

title: Purging the Filth
blocka: 'Press the attack! While we have the initiative!' Once unleashed, rage can only intensify (xxCOMBAT). Otherwise, one character making this test is Exhausted.

title: The Subtect
text: Oh my dear Thea, surely you have more pressing matters at home to attend to!
blocka: Attach to The Wrenhouse.
blockb: xxCIRCLE When The Subtect is burned, add 2 Progress to the Veil Ward threat.
blockc: xxACTIVATE Subtract 2 Mission Progress and take 2 Discord.

title: Zarrah
text: Art and culture lives and dies with Lily Manor.
blocka: Attach to Goldspike.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord for each issue in play.

title: High Society
text: Wine and roses, art and play.
blocka: Attach to Goldspike.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Reroll Mission Progress.

title: Moment of Clarity
text: The spirit is willing...
blocka: Attach to The Wrenhouse.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord and may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location.

title: Strong Arm Tactics
text: The Empire has dug their heels in very well.
blocka: Attach to Beetle Burrough.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: Viator
text: One hand washes the other.
blocka: Attach to Hall of Brass.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Reroll all Mission Progress dice at this location.

title: Sut
text: And finally, sign here. And here. And one more time... here.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: Global Stability
text: How can you say that when such problems are happening in your own backyard?
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Long Shadows
text: It will take careful work to overcome this.
blocka: xxACTIVATE Subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: Eastern Isolationism
text: And yet this is the first we've heard of these plans? How can you help us defend against the coming threats?
blocka: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: The Sapphire Djinn
text: You... amuse me. Let's play!
blocka: xxCIRCLE When the Sapphire Djinn is burned, add 2 progress to the Veil Ward threat.
blockb: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord and add 1 Mana die to pool.

title: No Rest
blocka: May take 1 Discord to move a character at this location to any other location.

title: A Shining Example
blocka: Peace at home is peace abroad. If Stability is higher than 2, may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location.

title: Yasmina's Concern
blocka: 'If you'll allow me to speak candidly - this threat is far greater than you realize. I have been sent to help you.' You may take 2 Discord to add a Mana die to Goldspike.

title: Viator's Charm
blocka: 'Why, but of course. Tonight is a night to be merry! Worries should be left at the door. A small little town like Red Bank can cause no disturbance here.' One character at this location is Angry.

title: Viator's Sympathy
blocka: 'Every city is of importance. Lily Manor will do everything in its power to aid Red Bank. Any kingdom, large or small, is deserving of peace.' Draw two asset cards.

title: Pleasure Dome
blocka: 'Thank you for these wonderful gifts! Let us enjoy them (xxRAPPORT)!' If failed, remove a Luxury die from the Hall of Brass.

title: Wine Harvest
blocka: 'I'm not as think as you drunk I am (xxRAPPORT)!' If failed, reroll Mission Progress at this location.

title: Pillow Talk
blocka: 'You don't say? And who said that, exactly (xxRAPPORT)?' If passed, draw the top asset card. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Akilah
blocka: Not everyone in the Empire is content with the Autarch's rule. Akilah, a servant in the Subtect's envoy, may be a useful ally (xxRAPPORT). If passed, add a Mission Progress die to this location. Otherwise, one character making this test is Frustrated.

title: Grave Concerns
blocka: Crooked yellowed teeth and sinister intent. Too much time in Beetle Burrough isn't good for your health (xxTHIEVERY). If failed, take 1 Discord.

title: Foreign Spells
blocka: 'Thea, this magic points directly back to the Autarch. Perhaps we can find a source (xxTHIEVERY)?' If passed, add 2 Progress to the Veil Ward threat.

title: Poison!
blocka: 'Wait, what's this residue on your glass (xxTHIEVERY)?' If failed, one character taking this test is Wounded.

title: The Drug Trade
blocka: Contacts in the Wrenhouse are difficult to uncover (xxDISGUISE). If failed, one character making this test is Exhausted.

title: Rising Darkness
blocka: 'Only communicate using the Veil Ward - never out in the open (xxDISGUISE).' If failed, take 1 Discord.

title: Envoys from Burgan Vale
blocka: The hooded figures looked at Menas carefully, judging the wisdom of his suggestion (xxTACTICS). If passed, may reroll any Mission Progress at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Unified Front
blocka: Menas frowned, looking back at Fuscus with a confused expression. They would need to go over the plan one more time (xxTACTICS). If passed, may exchange a Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.
